alert.note: Alert for Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 3:23PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Blaine, central Power, central Lincoln, northern Cassia, southwestern Bingham and southern Minidoka Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 321 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Aberdeen to near Minidoka to 8 miles southeast of Richfield. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and graupel. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burley, Rupert, American Falls, Heyburn, Shoshone, Lake Walcott, Neeley, western American Falls Reservoir, Aberdeen, Paul, Richfield, Declo, Rockland, Albion, Minidoka, Cold Water Rest Area, Fort Hall Bannock Peak, Dietrich, Acequia and Yale Rest Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
